model_answer: We see a futuristic map device and multiple on-screen release dates along with a behind-the-scenes green screen shot at the following time segment: [00:02:27 - 00:03:00].

The correct answer is D: [00:03:40 - 00:04:10]. 

The screen displays the overlay text “A visit on earth?” at approximately 3 minutes and 40 seconds into the movie, followed by a discussion about Jake being an ambassador to the Na'vi on Earth. The scene then cuts to a stark industrial machine and an injured person in an urban alley before the speaker expresses disappointment.
